options: ['Near our school.', 'Behind the park.', 'At the foot of the hill.', 'Under a tree.']
questions: Where are their father and mother sitting?
article: There is a park near our school. We can see many trees and flowers there. We can see a hill behind the park, too. At the foot of the hill we can see a river. There are some boats on it. It is Sunday today. There are many Young Pioneers  in the park. Some are walking and singing. Some are dancing or playing games. Ann and her sister Kate are flying a kite. Tom and his brother Sam are throwing a frisbee  . Their parents are sitting under a tree. All the family are having a good time.
